CustomField.description: Difference between incoming date and DOB
CustomField.formula: CASE( FLOOR(( DATEVALUE(animalos__Incoming_Date__c) - animalos__Date_of_Birth__c) / 365), 0, '', TEXT( FLOOR(( DATEVALUE(animalos__Incoming_Date__c) - animalos__Date_of_Birth__c) / 365 )) & " YEARS " ) & CASE( FLOOR( MOD( DATEVALUE(animalos__Incoming_Date__c) - animalos__Date_of_Birth__c, 365 ) / 30.44 ), 0, '', TEXT( FLOOR( MOD( DATEVALUE (animalos__Incoming_Date__c) - animalos__Date_of_Birth__c, 365 ) / 30.44 ) ) & " MONTHS " )
CustomField.label: Age on Arrival
